name: Before Time Runs Out
description:
In this modern twist on the 2D platform game, make your way through numerous traps and obstacles such as spikes, saws, laser beams and explosives to reach the goal at the end of each level. Each level has a limited time to complete. You can collect time orbs throughout the level to increase your time. But remember, speed is the key or it's game over.



Game Components
- Each Level Is Physics Based.
- Speed Is Key.
- Each Level Has A Limited Amount Of Time To Complete.
- Momentum Is Vital To Reaching The End Of Each Level.
- Over 60 Unique Levels.



Obstacles
- Spikes
- Saws
- Laser Beams
- Explosives
- Yourself
